::FireStrike::
As Firestrike flew into the air he was hit with with two shots in the 
arm jacking his rifle out of his hand.  He landed and pulled out his 
giant 7 foot long 3 foot wide sword.  As he gripped the hilt blue 
flame covered it instantly bringing it to a temperature rivaling that 
of the Pit itself.
"So you want to play with blades do you?"
He took a swing across at Unitron then without knowing if he hit him 
made another swipe down.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Unitron:
> 
> 
> 
> The near ten million year old robot sidestepped as he saw another 
robot 
> intrude, in the process avoiding Megatron's blast.  He ducked down, 
firing 
> off five rapid optic blasts at Megatron's left knee joint, and two 
blasts 
> from the rifle he held in his right hand at Firestrike's abdomen.
> 
> "Now I am sure you an impostor.  The real Megatron would not have 
called for 
> his cronies, even if he were losing!  He had to much pride!"  Still 
in a 
> crouched position and ready to spring his left hand shot out and 
with a 
> magnetic attraction, the now deactivated energy blade's hilt flew 
into his 
> left hand, a fist now surrounding the hilt as the pink glow of 
deadly energy 
> extended from it for a few feet.
> 
> "I will kill all the tw--" Unitron began but stopped, seeing the 
third robot, 
> Nightstrike come into view.  He kept his comm. open, just in case 
he needed 
> to call for reinforcements.
